prompts: Create an aquatic Pokemon that controls the ocean with its powerful water abilities.
I want a legendary creature that can summon storms and reigns over the sea.
Generate a sleek, blue Pokemon with fins and a majestic tail for my collection.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean with vibrant colors and unique features.
Imagine a mythical water-type Pokemon that can communicate with marine life and navigate through storms.
Design a Pokemon with a streamlined body and impressive swimming skills for a water battle.
Show me a powerful sea creature that is both feared and revered in the Pokemon world.
